item.description:
Students learning beginning Japanese are generally studying from their own books.
Students learning intermediate Japanese are generally reading stories and talking in Japanese.
Students learning intermediate-advanced English are reading from the book "Tuesdays with Morrie."

If you would like to study something else, possible, please bring a couple of photocopies of whatever you are currently studying (for instance, grammar, vocabulary list, a short reading, etc.), index cards.

I have put some directions, maps, and information of the class on my website:
http://www.accidental...

If you can't get into the Stata center, wait a couple of minutes. There are always students who are walking in and out of the building who can open the door for you.
item.how_to_find_us: We are in the back of the Cafe area.
item.name: Japanese and English Study Night
